grandpas_initial: As you were walking to bed last night you bumped into something strange, but you were extremely tired, and decided to leave it until morning. After you woke up, you noticed it was a wrapped package with a letter on top. You opened the letter.
grandpas_letter: Dear {{name}}, ^ I'm glad to see that you have taken over my farm. I have always wanted to give you something. The time was never right though, now that you're here. It's yours. I really do hope you have as much fun here as I did. Good luck {{name}}^ Love Grandpa
